trashday

Class ScheduleUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • trashday.ScheduleUtils

  • public final class ScheduleUtils
extends Object
    Provides helper functions to handle schedule creation, read, and update while updating the user's Session and schedule storage in Dynamo DB.

    Provides abilities to:

    • Create new schedules (empty or with example data) and store in the user's Session
    • Allow saving the schedule from the Session to Dynamo DB.
    • Allow loading the schedule from Dynamo DB to the user's Session
    Author:
    J. Todd Baldwin

      • loadScheduleFromSession

        public static Schedule loadScheduleFromSession(com.amazon.speech.speechlet.Session session)
        Load a given Schedule from the Session. Get the Schedule from the Session if it is available. Otherwise, try to load from Dynamo DB. Finally, return null if it is not available in either location.
        Parameters:
        session - Session for this request
        Returns:
        if existing, the Schedule
